title: Is it Too Late for Anthem? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.18.20
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss a new Respawn studio and also ask the question, is it too late for Anthem?   

Time Stamps - 
 0:03:00 - Housekeeping
Next week is Kinda Funhaus week! - Tim tell us a bit about what’s going on
REMEMBER: We’re doing a Core Game Jam - kindafunny.com/gamejam - $100 gets donated to Extra Life for every game submitted. To enter, publish a new game on the Core platform in one of four categories: party game, (kinda) funniest game, retro game, and pop-culture inspired game. There’s $5k in prizes, head to kindafunny.com/gamejam
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Black Jack, Al Tribesman
The Roper Report   -
00:07:10 - Anthem is still being worked on - Mathew Handrahan @ GIBiz
00:19:49 - Respawn’s opening a second studio to focus on Apex Legends - Rebekah Valentine @ GIBiz
00:28:50 - Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1&2 won’t have microtransactions at launch - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:32:02 -  - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:39:40 - Ubisoft Sues Apple and Google Over Mobile Rainbow Six Siege Clone - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:41:50 - You Can Play A New Dance Dance Revolution In Your Browser Right Now - Ethan Gach @ Kotaku
00:44:20 - A quick one: Gamescom Opening Night Live is now happening August 27th
00:44:40 - Out today
00:45:30 -  Brooklinen
00:46:26 - Express VPN
 Reader mail   -
00:48:41 - Do you think there’s a possibility that we could get to play as Spider-Man on the PlayStation version of the game. - Bravesfan88
00:51:33 - Squad Up: Jeff Liewer(PC) - Hadescouncil
00:52:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Imran
